name: Polygon Pals
description:
An educational match 3 game intended to teach children 6 and under about shapes and the relationships between different shapes.

This game is still in development and has a limited number of levels. If you found this game enjoyable or helpful, we would appreciate a donation of any amount!

Features
  • No Text
  • One button
  • Color-blind friendly
  • Ad-free
Controls
  • Left mouse button
Why?

In late June 2020, we began to hear of the difficulties parents and children had experienced with COVID-19 and remote learning, particularly in our area. In response to that, we thought about what we could do to help.

We reached out to some acquaintances who are teachers, and talked about educational games available for them to help with teaching. Unfortunately, we found that a lot aren't due to technological or financial limitations, and so we decided to make a game!

This game as it is now is very simple, and has a limited number of levels. We hope to add more levels over time and adjust the difficulty to better teach about shapes and their relationships. We intend to use the Ontario Government's Grade 1 Math Curriculum as a basis for what information to include.

This game is offered as Pay-What-You-Want (PWYW) in order to make it available to those who cannot afford to purchase educational games, especially in these times.

If you are able to donate, and enjoyed the game, we would appreciate any donation amount so we can spend the time to make more levels, and bring the game to other platforms.

If you have questions, comments, or suggestions , please consider making a post!
